content: 1 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getFlightPlanFuels ``` # Flight Plan Minimum Equipment List Service ### Request ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/flight/flightPlanMel/{legId}?page={page}&size={size} ``` ### Response ```json { "result": [ { "legId": "14628517", "flightPlanMels": [ { "extraInfo": "Flight Plan Mel Item Info", "regId": "TCSNZ", "ataReference": "45-10-02-01B", "description": "INFORMATION SYSTEMS 45-10-02-01B : MEL D : Procedures Do Not Require Use", "status": "ACTIVE" } ] } ], "totalPage": 1, "totalItem": 1 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getFlightPlanMels ``` # Flight Plan Trip Info Service ### Request ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/flight/flightPlanTripInfo/{legId}?page={page}&size={size} ``` ### Response ```json { "result": [ { "legId": "14561231", "flightPlanTripInfos": [ { "extraInfo": "Flight Plan Trip Info", "udor": "2024-06-20", "carrier": "XQ", "flightNumber": "270", "flightTime": "03:15", "regulatedFlightTime": "03:15", "departureAirport": "AYT", "arrivalAirport": "ADB", "acRegNo": "TCSNT", "acSubtype": "B737-800", "numberOfCockpitCrew": "2 x COCKPIT CREW", "numberOfCabinCrew": "4 x CABIN CREW (2 FWD+ 2 AFT)", "pantryCode": "B", "dow": 41843.00, "regulatedDow": 41843.00, "doi": 50.30, "regulatedDoi": 50.30, "matow": 79000, "regulatedMatow": 79000, "tripFuel": 8552, "regulatedTripFuel": 8552, "takeOffFuel": 12500, "taxiFuel": 400, "blockFuel": 12900, "fuelRequest": "Y", "preparedBy": "G. JOHANSSON", "versionNumber": 1, "captainCrewId": "MATT", "confirmDate": "2024-07-22T01:47:29Z", "efbOfpNumber": "7", "efbCockpitCrewList": "MATT,BITT" } ] } ], "totalPage": 1, "totalItem": 1 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getFlightPlanTripInfos ```
